snippet.title: Veiled Skies General Gameplay
snippet.description:
Fusion Skills - overview 

Combat in VS is very similar to "Bravely Default" - your characters can "store turns" for future use, or "stack" them to use multiple skills in a row! These actions require a resource called "Combo Points" or CP for short. They can also mix items for powerful effects and execute fusion skills. You can cancel a character's extra action by pressing the Esc key or X.

Whenever a character combines one or more skills, the result is a "Fusion Skill". Fusion skills require 2 or more CP (Combo Points) to use (that's the little number next to the character HUD). 

In this video, Rina, our heroine, is combining "Crescent Moon" and "Kaguya" to create "Moonlit Blade", a Fusion skill. Moonlit Blade instantly fills her TP or technique meter. Frigid Realm, her special, requires 100 TP to activate. It is a powerful AoE spell that inflicts both Frozen and Freeze. When a foe is inflicted with Freeze, the next blow is an instant KO. 

Aya's combination of "Headshot" and "Sorry Not Sorry" gives us "Richocheting Bullet".

There are dozens of extra abilities to discover.
